short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that makes every word in text in different random color on any website it's activated on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A helper extension for the average ADHD reader.
You may find text more easy-to-follow when the contrast between words is high, as monotonous color in text often lead to loss of focus, especially for people with ADHD.
